features: HANDS-FREE MOP WRINGING – Use the pedal-activated wringer built into the mop bucket to spin-wring your mop between rinses. No more hand-wringing or sloppy water mopping
ADJUSTABLE POLE LENGTH – Find the perfect height for comfortable cleaning with the adjustable pole mop
MICROFIBER MOP HEAD – The soft microfiber mop head easily picks up dirt and is safe on most non-porous floor surfaces
MACHINE WASHABLE AND REPLACEABLE MOP HEAD – The mop head can be removed and machine washed or replaced as needed
WHAT’S INCLUDED - This easy clean floor mop includes one mop, two machine washable microfiber cleaning mop heads, and a bucket with manual spin pedal
body.description: At Fabuloso, we know life is full of everyday messiness, and that’s why we focus on products that help you refresh your space – and do it with a bit of flair. Our products help you tackle that to-do list with style and exuberance. Get what you need to do done quicker so you can focus on what you want to do. The Fabuloso Spin Mop and Bucket are designed for hands-free mop wringing between rinses. Simply activate the pedal with your foot to spin your mop head after rinsing. You can even adjust how much moisture remains in your mop head with how fast you pump the pedal. This mop and bucket set includes an adjustable height mop pole, two microfiber mop heads that are machine washable or replaceable as needed, and a bucket with built-in pedal spin wringer. Use with your favorite multi-purpose floor cleaning solution. Do not use undiluted floor cleaner, bleach, or wax. No batteries required. Quick and easy assembly. Fabuloso is a brand meant for anyone who takes pride in their home and wants it to shine! Be sure to check out the full line of Fabuloso cleaning tools, from tough scrubbing sponges and microfiber cleaning cloths to convenient cleaning mitts and easy-to-use mops. Our simplified, yet effective, solutions for everything from everyday cleaning to deep cleaning marathons help to make every inch of your home vibrant and fresh! Refresh your space with flair! Your satisfaction is our priority. Please reach out to us with any questions or concerns regarding this product at Brand Buzz CP.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: It's not just a cleaning product, it's a catalyst for joy! Fabuloso is a brand meant for anyone who takes pride in their home and wants it to shine! With a variety of convenient cleaning tools, a sparkling home is right at your fingertips.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Who really likes to clean?
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. THIS GIRL DOES!! I never really liked cleaning, let alone mopping, but having recently discovered the intoxicating smell of purple Fabuloso, I’m now jumping at the chance to clean. When searching for Fabuloso, this mop and bucket came up in the results, so I figured I’d give it a try. I thought it would end up in the closet along with all the other systems for mopping that I had tried. But not this one! It has a prominent place for easy access when needed. I jump at the chance to use it. Easy to fill with water and even easier to dump with the sturdy handle. The mop head (it comes with 2) is easy to attach and detach from the mop, can be thrown in the wash if needed, and really does a superb job of cleaning. The spinner works great, and you can customize how wet or dry you want the mop head, by pumping 2-3 times, or 6-8 times. The more you pump, the less wet the mop head is. And when you’re done, and rinsed the soap and dirt out, you can spin till it’s practically dry! No more moldy or musty mop heads!! The mop handle is screwed together and has a handle that you hold while spinning to allow the pole to spin in your hand. That’s the neatest feature! The mop head swivels to get under spaces too!I LOVE THIS MOPPING SYSTEM! Going to dispose of all the others!And it works with wood or tile floors too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this,love the color and it was easy to put together & use!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The spinning mechanism really does ring out the mop head well and the mop overall is pretty sturdy. Sometimes the handle would come undone while spinning the mop head dry but I still love it overall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don't have to touch dirty water!
reviews.reviewText: This spin mop and bucket is amazing. You don't have to ever, ever touch nasty dirty water again! Mopping was not my favorite thing because well it grossed me out to touch the dirty water or dirty mop. I have tried the swifter but found it didn't clean my floors and way to expensive for the pads. My mom had a more expensive spins mop and I loved it. I found this one much cheaper and ordered it June. I use it twice a day and absolutely love it. It works just as my mom's expensive one. It cleans my kitchen floor perfectly. My kitchen floor gets most of the traffic because let's face it " the kitchen is the heart of the home "., and the spin and mop does not disappoint. Two months later it is still the best. Plus you get two mop heads which are machine washable and hold up nicely in the washer. Buy the Fabulouso spin and mop bucket you won't be sorry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I clean houses for a living. Have lot of experience with these types mops and buckets. I ordered this one for home. Should have ordered a different brand like Twist and Shout or OCedar. This mop will not stay together when you spin it. Terrible product. So no mop just a bucket.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Love the circular mop head. It is nice to not have to wring the moo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my apartment. it's so easy to use. The mop is sturdy and the bucket isn't flimsy. It works great. The bucket is perfect size to fit under a standard cabinet. The mop breaks down. The fluffy thing is easy to clean and easy on and off. This is worth every penny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the color works great except it comes unscrewed constantly
